Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the image recipe.

Name.description: The name of the image recipe.

Description.description: The description of the image recipe.

Version.description: The version of the image recipe.

Components.description: The components of the image recipe.

BlockDeviceMappings.description: The block device mappings to apply when creating images from this recipe.

ParentImage.description: The parent image of the image recipe.

WorkingDirectory.description: The working directory to be used during build and test workflows.

Tags.description: The tags of the image recipe.

ComponentArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the component.

InstanceBlockDeviceMapping.description: Defines block device mappings for the instance used to configure your image.

DeviceName.description: The device to which these mappings apply.

VirtualName.description: Use to manage instance ephemeral devices.

NoDevice.description: Use to remove a mapping from the parent image.

Ebs.description: Use to manage Amazon EBS-specific configuration for this mapping.

EbsInstanceBlockDeviceSpecification.description: Amazon EBS-specific block device mapping specifications.

DeleteOnTermination.description: Use to configure delete on termination of the associated device.

KmsKeyId.description: Use to configure the KMS key to use when encrypting the device.

SnapshotId.description: The snapshot that defines the device contents.

VolumeSize.description: Use to override the device's volume size.

VolumeType.description: Use to override the device's volume type.
